mapper.select: select username, password, email, authority, balance, createdt, enabled, vip, expiredt from account where username = #{username}
select username, password, email, authority, balance, createdt, enabled, vip, expiredt from account where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into account (username, password, email, authority, createdt, enabled, vip, expiredt) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{authority}, #{createdt}, #{enabled}, #{vip}, #{expiredt})
mapper.update: update account set logindt = #{logindt} where username = #{username}
update account set password = #{password}, email = #{email}, enabled = #{enabled}, expiredt = #{expiredt} where username = #{username}
mapper.select: update account set balance = (balance + #{balance}) where username = #{username} returning balance
